text: Trump, co-defendants to be arraigned in Georgia on Sept. 6  —  Former President Trump will be arraigned next Wednesday in Georgia over charges he and 18 co-defendants sought to overturn the state's election results.  —  Trump's arraignment has been set for Sept. 6 at 9:30 a.m. …
